attributes.action: have our much needed wages paid A.S.A.P.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some NHS Health Trusts based in Northern Ireland have as yet not paid the back pay due to their workers which dates back to October 2004 were as some Health Trusts within the Northern Ireland have started the process of paying this much needed back pay to their staff, the typical low paid worker such as porters, domestics and catering staff who work full-time are due somewhere in the region of approximately £4,000 each and part-time workers pro-rata. Staff who have kept the NHS afloat during troubled times are being fed strawman arguments as excuses.Is this the way that our Government wants to treat staff like myself with 30years loyal service.
